ComicInfo.Title: The Cure For You; Time and Again
ComicInfo.Summary:
Trying to acclimate to life as a mutant, the newest Turtle Jennika embarks on a solo adventure that will force her to come to terms with both her troubled past and conflicted present. Not to mention a brand new villain! Brahm Revel (Guerrillas) returns to reveal more of Jennika's backstory from his acclaimed TMNT Universe tale "What is Ninja?"!

Williams II | 3 | RE | WonderCon Exclusive Variant Cover | Jodi Nishijima | 4 | RE | Bell County Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Matthew Weldon (a) & Timothy Lim (c) | 5 | RE | Big County Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Mike Rooth | 6 | RE | Black Flag Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Kael Ngu | 7 | RE | Black Flag Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Kael Ngu | 8 | RE | 5-Star Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | In-Hyuk Lee | 9 | RE | Comic Spot Exclusive Variant Cover | Tyler Kirkham | 10 | RE | Comic Spot Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Tyler Kirkham | 11 | RE | Frankies Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Mike Vasquez | 12 | RE | Game Changer Exclusive Variant Cover | Dan Conner | 13 | RE | Incredible Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Mike Federali | 14 | RE | Lexington Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 15 | *Notes:* The Comic Spot Exclusive Variant Covers are a homage of the cover of The Amazing Spider-Man #50.The Game Changer Exclusive Variant Cover is a homage of the covers of Crack Comics #36, The Incredible Hulk #1 and The Savage She-Hulk #1.The Incredible Con Exclusive Variant Cover is a homage of the cover of All-Star Comics #6.
